00007 #define FORTIFY_STORAGE              /* storage for public functions   */
00008 
00009 #define FORTIFY_ALIGNMENT        sizeof(double) /* Byte alignment of all memory blocks */
00010 
00011 #define FORTIFY_BEFORE_SIZE      32  /* Bytes to allocate before block */
00012 #define FORTIFY_BEFORE_VALUE   0xA3  /* Fill value before block        */
00013                       
00014 #define FORTIFY_AFTER_SIZE       32  /* Bytes to allocate after block  */
00015 #define FORTIFY_AFTER_VALUE    0xA5  /* Fill value after block         */
00016 
00017 #define FORTIFY_FILL_ON_ALLOCATE               /* Nuke out malloc'd memory       */
00018 #define FORTIFY_FILL_ON_ALLOCATE_VALUE   0xA7  /* Value to initialize with       */
00019 
00020 #define FORTIFY_FILL_ON_DEALLOCATE             /* free'd memory is cleared       */
00021 #define FORTIFY_FILL_ON_DEALLOCATE_VALUE 0xA9  /* Value to de-initialize with    */
00022 
00023 #define FORTIFY_FILL_ON_CORRUPTION             /* Nuke out corrupted memory    */
00024

00028 
00029 #define FORTIFY_WARN_ON_ZERO_MALLOC  /* !! added */ /* A debug is issued on a malloc(0) */
00030 #define FORTIFY_FAIL_ON_ZERO_MALLOC  /* !! added */ /* A malloc(0) will fail            */
00031 
00032 #define FORTIFY_WARN_ON_ALLOCATE_FAIL    /* A debug is issued on a failed alloc  */
00033 #define FORTIFY_WARN_ON_FALSE_FAIL       /* See Fortify_SetAllocateFailRate      */
00034 #define FORTIFY_WARN_ON_SIZE_T_OVERFLOW  /* Watch for breaking the 64K limit in  */
00035                                          /* some braindead architectures...      */
